features: Infused with coconut milk and aloe vera – TRESemmé Botanique Nourish and Replenish Conditioner smooths and silken your hair for salon-quality results.
This conditioner moisturizes and replenishes without the use of nasty silicones, parabens and dyes.
Leaves your hair feeling Moisturized, Soft and looking beautiful.
Features a botanical blend of coconut milk and aloe vera.
For best results pair it with Tresemme Botanique Nourish + Replenish Shampoo.
body.description: Tresemme Botanique Nourish + Replenish Conditioner, Coconut Oil and Aloe Vera - 24 Fl Oz / 700 mL x 2 PackFor thirsty, frizzy hair in need of a hydrating boost, use TRESemme Botanique Nourish & Replenish Shampoo and Conditioner, enriched with coconut milk and nourishing aloe vera. We adore natural ingredients, just like you. So we found a way to marry rich botanical ingredients, like coconut milk and aloe vera, in our professional-quality formulas to deliver a conditioner that not only detangles, but also quenches dry, brittle locks. Free from parabens, dyes and silicones and enriched with a botanical blend, our professional-quality formula simultaneously nourishes and moisturizes each time you lather up for healthy looking hair. Start your routine with TRESemme Botanique Nourish & Replenish Shampoo. Apply and rinse. Then squeeze a generous amount of TRESemme Botanique Nourish & Replenish Conditioner into palms and rub hands together. Apply to damp hair, focusing on ends to mid-lengths first, and then work any remaining conditioner up toward the roots. Leave in 2-3 minutes, then rinse thoroughly. Follow with TRESemme Botanique Collection treatment products to maximize nourishment and add moisture. The TRESemme Botanique Nourish & Replenish system, infused with coconut milk and aloe vera, simultaneously smooths and silkens for healthy-looking hair. Best of all, this conditioner moisturizes and replenishes without the use of nasty silicones, parabens and dyes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Hair's Best Friend
reviews.reviewText: Tresemme Botanique Nourish + Replenish Conditioner is a true gem. It leaves my hair feeling silky and hydrated, even after heat styling and daily wear. The natural ingredients give it a refreshing scent, and it's gentle on my scalp. The conditioner is a total game-changer for detangling and preventing breakage. My hair looks and feels healthier with each use. It's now a staple in my shower routine, and I can't get enough!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this conditioner and so glad I could find it on Amazon because I can no longer find it in the stores

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner always leaves my hair clean and silky. I have tried others and this one is by far the best. My hair is long and this conditioner untangles it easily!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots to binge
reviews.reviewText: The only thing I found disappointing, was that I could not order single container at a time. The quantity will last until 2025! LOL

reviews.reviewText: Why must we keep altering the products that work. Slightly different formula than expected.
